name: Astraeus (itch) (tomshinton)
description:
Create starsigns to reform the planet - but beware! Constellations may form by themselves, and their effects may not necessarily be in your favour.

Channel Earth, Wind, Fire and Water to summon blazing firestorms, catastrophic earthquakes, heavy rain or biting winds to influence the planet below, for good or ill.

Sound and Music for Games | We Love Indies
